page.title: 18RELIGION:CHURCHES AND CHAPEL
page.content: We have two Churches and one Chapel. The churches are called{St Wenn and St {Clements.}The Chapel is at Demelza.The Vicar of St Clements Church in Withiel is Rev.Togood. The Church was dedicated to St Clement in 1478.St Clement is the patron saint of sailors.The church was rebuilt in 16th century. There is a grave yard at St Clement. { St.Wenn parish}is combined with {St.Columb.}The Rev Friggins is our priest.The church has a Norman font. On the truncated tower(storm damaged in 1663) is a punning sundial.It says {"Ye know not when". { Demelza chapel}was built in 1871 with granite stone.Services are held once a month. Circuit ministers are Rev Peter Grose and Rev Shirley Baker.Mrs Jean Beannallick plays the organ.The chapel anniversary is held in May.
